attributes.action: put the Government's money where it's mouth is' on climate change and abolish the toll charge to use the Dartford River Crossing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The crossing has been paid for in full from fees up until now. If the toll fee is abolished and the booths removed the resulting free flow of traffic will significantly reduce harmful emmissions from congestion caused by queues of vehicles waiting to get through.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
